mapper.select: SELECT CD_DEDUCT , (SELECT NM_DEDUCT FROM SADEDUCT d WHERE d.CD_DEDUCT = s.CD_DEDUCT) as NM_DEDUCT , ALLOW_PAY , CD_EMP , ALLOW_MONTH , ALLOW_YEAR , PAYMENT_DATE FROM SADEDUCTPAY s WHERE CD_EMP = #{cdEmp} AND ALLOW_MONTH = #{allowMonth} AND CD_DEDUCT = #{cdDeduct}

SELECT s.CD_DEDUCT , (SELECT NM_DEDUCT FROM SADEDUCT s2 WHERE s2.CD_DEDUCT=s.CD_DEDUCT) AS NM_DEDUCT , sum(s.ALLOW_PAY) AS SUM_DEDUCT_PAY FROM SADEDUCTPAY s WHERE 1=1 AND s.ALLOW_MONTH = '2023-08' AND s.CD_EMP = #{cdEmp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.ALLOW_MONTH = #{allowMonth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s.ALLOW_YEAR = #{allowYear, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY s.CD_DEDUCT
